title: Light Radiology
description:
At Light Radiology we are passionate about innovating Radiology to improve patient care and outcomes. Light Radiology App is an integrated App which gives patients fast and easy access to images and reports on mobile, tablet and desktop.

The App is simple and intuitive, with the ability to quickly search through your images and reports.

As a patient, you will continue to have peace of mind knowing that all your images and reports are stored with the highest security, enabling secure access, tracking and auditing. 

The images will be available 2 hours after you have completed your examination at Light Radiology. The report will be released to your app within a 7 day timeframe, this allows you enough time to discuss the results with your doctors.

For all further information, please email info@lightradiology.com.au, alternatively contact one of our clinics directly.
